amendment.description: Amendment adds entities that are involved in the development and advancement of biotechnology to the definition of technology-related entities eligible for grants under the Technology Innovation Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-118 to add firms and/o r entities that are involved in the development and advancement of biotechnology to the definition of technology-related entities eligible for grants under the Technology Innovation Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wynn amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Wynn.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wynn amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
